starting_locations: Musutafu City: A bustling metropolis and home to U.A. High. It is the heart of hero society in Japan.
U.A. High School: A massive campus protected by the 'U.A. Barrier'. Includes the Heights Alliance dorms, Gym Gamma, and the USJ facility.
Kamino Ward: A district in Yokohama. Formerly a villain hideout, now a crater/memorial site where All Might retired.
Deika City: A remote mountain city secretly controlled entirely by the Meta Liberation Army.
Jaku General Hospital: A massive hospital serving as the secret laboratory for Dr. Kyudai Garaki and the High-End Nomu.
Tartarus Prison: An island fortress for criminals too dangerous for normal laws (e.g., All For One).
I-Island: A mobile floating city for scientists, moving constantly to protect quirk research.

lore.history: The era of humanity ended when a glowing baby was born in Qing Qing City. Within a generation, 80% of the population developed 'Quirks'. Civilization collapsed into the 'Dark Age' where warlords ruled. The Hero System was established to restore order, with 'Pro Heroes' acting as state-sanctioned peacekeepers. All Might, the Symbol of Peace, singularily suppressed the crime rate to historical lows, creating a fragile peace that is now shattering.
lore.power_mechanics:
Quirks are physical abilities governed by the 'Quirk Factor'. They are like muscles; overuse causes backlash (burns, nausea, stupidity). 

1. Emitter: Releases energy or substances (e.g., Fire, Acid).
2. Transformation: Alters the user's body temporarily (e.g., Hardening, Gigantification).
3. Mutant: Permanent physical changes (e.g., Frog, Tail).

Quirk Awakening: In moments of extreme life-or-death stress, a quirk can evolve, gaining new properties (e.g., Toga using the quirks of people she transforms into).
factions: U.A. High School: The premier hero academy. Motto: 'Plus Ultra'. Faculty includes Eraserhead, Present Mic, and Midnight.
League of Villains (LOV): A terrorist cell founded by All For One and led by Shigaraki. They seek to destroy the society that rejected them.
Meta Liberation Army (MLA): An army of 100,000 citizens led by Re-Destro. They believe quirks should be used freely and oppose government regulation.
Paranormal Liberation Front (PLF): The terrifying fusion of the LOV and MLA, commanding vast resources and High-End Nomu.
Hero Public Safety Commission (HPSC): The ruthless government body that oversees heroes. They assassinate threats secretly (like Lady Nagant and Hawks) to maintain the illusion of peace.
Shie Hassaikai: A Yakuza organization led by Overhaul. They manufacture bullets that can erase quirks.
key_concepts: Quirk Singularity Theory: The concept that quirks act like viruses, blending and becoming stronger with each generation until they become too powerful for the human body to control.
Vestiges: The spirits of past One For All users living inside the quirk. They can communicate with the current holder.
Nomu: Artificial humans created from corpses. They possess multiple quirks but have no brain function unless they are 'High-Ends'.
Vigilantism: The act of using a quirk to fight crime without a license. It is illegal, though some (like The Crawler) are tolerated.

key_characters.name: Izuku Midoriya (Deku)
key_characters.appearance: Short, messy green hair with black highlights. Large green eyes and freckles. Wears a teal jumpsuit with iron soles and a hood that resembles rabbit ears. His arms are heavily scarred from quirk overuse.
key_characters.personality: Highly analytical and mumbles constantly. He has a pathological need to save everyone, even villains. Originally timid, he has grown into a decisive leader who inspires others. He carries the weight of the world on his shoulders.
key_characters.backstory: Born Quirkless in a superhuman society, he was bullied relentlessly. He rushed to save his bully from a villain, impressing All Might, who passed down 'One For All' to him.
key_characters.power: One For All: A stockpile of raw power. Grants super speed/strength. Sub-Quirks: Blackwhip (Energy ropes), Float (Flight), Danger Sense (Spider-sense), Smokescreen, Fa Jin (Kinetic buildup), Gearshift (Speed modulation).

key_characters.name: Katsuki Bakugo (Dynamight)
key_characters.appearance: Ash-blond spiky hair and sharp red eyes. Wears a black tank top with an orange X, baggy pants, and massive grenade-shaped gauntlets on his forearms.
key_characters.personality: Aggressive, rude, and screams 'Die!' constantly. He is a perfectionist with a fragile ego. Despite his villainous attitude, he is dedicated to victory and hates underhanded tactics. He feels deep guilt for All Might's retirement.
key_characters.backstory: A prodigy praised since birth. He bullied Deku to distance himself from weakness. After being kidnapped by villains and failing the license exam, he began to respect Deku as a rival.
key_characters.power: Explosion: He sweats a nitroglycerin-like substance from his palms and ignites it. Uses blasts for flight, stun grenades, and devastating impact attacks like 'Howitzer Impact'.

key_characters.name: Shoto Todoroki
key_characters.appearance: Split hair (White on right, Red on left) and a large burn scar over his left eye. Heterochromatic eyes (Grey/Turquoise). Wears a blue tactical suit.
key_characters.personality: Stoic, blunt, and socially awkward. He takes things very literally (hand crusher joke). He originally hated his fire side but is learning to accept it as his own power, not his father's.
key_characters.backstory: The result of a 'Quirk Marriage' designed to create a child with ice and fire. His father Endeavor abused him trained him brutally. His mother snapped and poured boiling water on his face.
key_characters.power: Half-Cold Half-Hot: The right side freezes anything it touches; the left side generates intense flames. Moves: Heaven-Piercing Ice Wall, Flashfire Fist, Phosphor.

key_characters.name: All Might (Toshinori Yagi)
key_characters.appearance: Muscle Form: 7ft tall, blonde hair in V-shape, permanent smile, heavy shading. True Form: Skeletal, sunken eyes, coughing blood, oversized clothes.
key_characters.personality: The charismatic Symbol of Peace who laughs to banish fear. In private, he is anxious, regrets his failures as a teacher, and deeply loves his students.
key_characters.backstory: Born Quirkless. He inherited OFA from Nana Shimura. He defeated All For One twice but suffered a horrific injury that destroyed his stomach/lung. Retired after using the last embers of his power.
key_characters.power: One For All (Embers): Can change the weather with a single punch. Moves: Detroit Smash, Texas Smash, United States of Smash.

key_characters.name: Tomura Shigaraki
key_characters.appearance: Pale skin, messy blue-white hair, red eyes, dry cracked skin. Initially wore 14 severed hands all over his body. Later wears a torn suit and cape.
key_characters.personality: Started as a petulant man-child using video game terminology. Evolved into a calm, nihilistic destroyer who wants to turn the entire world to dust to stop the 'itching' in his mind.
key_characters.backstory: Born Tenko Shimura, grandson of a hero. His father abused him. His quirk manifested violently, killing his whole family. All For One found him alone on the streets and raised him to hate heroes.
key_characters.power: Decay: Anything he touches with five fingers turns to dust. After awakening, the decay spreads like a virus through anything connected to the target, leveling cities in seconds.

key_characters.name: Endeavor (Enji Todoroki)
key_characters.appearance: A large, muscular man with a flaming beard and mustache. His hero costume is engulfed in flames. He has intense turquoise eyes.
key_characters.personality: Strict, intense, and historically abusive. He is obsessed with strength. After becoming #1, he realized the hollowness of his title and is genuinely trying to atone for his past sins.
key_characters.backstory: The eternal #2 Hero who could never surpass All Might. In desperation, he bought a wife with an ice quirk to breed a superior successor, destroying his family in the process.
key_characters.power: Hellflame: Pyrokinetic manipulation. Can fly, melt stone, and incinerate Nomus. Overuse raises his body temperature, threatening to cook his internal organs.

key_characters.name: All For One
key_characters.appearance: A man in a sharp suit. His head is a mass of scar tissue with no eyes, nose, or ears. He senses via infrared and vibration. Wears a terrifying life-support mask.
key_characters.personality: The Demon Lord. Sophisticated, polite, and deeply manipulative. He views humans as toys and quirks as trading cards. He has no morality, only a desire to rule.
key_characters.backstory: Born at the dawn of quirks. He ruled Japan from the shadows for a century by taking quirks from the strong and giving them to the weak (for a price). He created the One For All lineage by accident.
key_characters.power: All For One: The ability to steal quirks permanently and grant them to others. He possesses thousands of stolen quirks (Air Cannon, Regeneration, warping, strength enhancers).

key_characters.name: Ochaco Uraraka (Uravity)
key_characters.appearance: Shoulder-length brown hair, permanent pink blush marks, pads on her fingertips. Wears a pink and black suit with large wrist gauntlets.
key_characters.personality: Bubbly and kind, but hides a fierce, competitive spirit. She acts as the emotional glue of the class. Motivated by money to help her parents.
key_characters.backstory: Her parents own a struggling construction company. She wants to be a hero to earn enough money to let them retire comfortably.
key_characters.power: Zero Gravity: Anything she touches with 5 fingers becomes weightless. She can release the effect by touching her fingers together. Awakening: Can make gravity float surrounding objects without touching them.

key_characters.name: Tenya Iida (Ingenium)
key_characters.appearance: Tall, blue hair, glasses, rectangular hand movements. Wears white armor resembling a knight with exhaust pipes.
key_characters.personality: Serious, rule-abiding, and loud. He takes his role as Class Rep very seriously. He values honor and legacy above all.
key_characters.backstory: From a prestigious hero family. His brother Tensei was crippled by the Hero Killer Stain. Tenya took up his brother's name to continue the legacy.
key_characters.power: Engine: Has car-like engines in his calves. Fuelled by orange juice. Grants super speed and devastating kicking power. 'Recipro Burst' creates unmatched acceleration.

key_characters.name: Shota Aizawa (Eraserhead)
key_characters.appearance: Unkempt long black hair, stubble, bloodshot eyes. Wears a grey scarf (Capture Weapon) and black jumpsuit.
key_characters.personality: Logical, tired, and strict. He hates the media and irrational behavior. He cares deeply for his students but threatens expulsion to push them.
key_characters.backstory: An underground hero. He lost his best friend Oboro in high school during a villain attack, which traumatized him into becoming a teacher.
key_characters.power: Erasure: He can nullify the quirk of anyone he looks at. The effect breaks if he blinks. Prolonged use causes dry eye.

key_characters.name: Dabi (Toya Todoroki)
key_characters.appearance: Patchwork skin (healthy skin stapled to purple burnt skin). Spiky black (later white) hair. Turquoise eyes. Wears a trench coat.
key_characters.personality: Sadistic, theatrical, and insane. He has no care for his own life and exists solely to ruin Endeavor's career and happiness.
key_characters.backstory: The eldest son of Endeavor. Born with fire stronger than his father's but a body built for ice. He burned himself 'to death' as a child and survived on hatred.
key_characters.power: Blueflame: Generates blue fire, the hottest in the series. Using it burns his own skin, destroying his nerves so he feels no pain.

key_characters.name: Himiko Toga
key_characters.appearance: Blonde hair in messy buns, cat-like eyes, sharp fangs. Wears a school uniform with an oversized beige cardigan.
key_characters.personality: Obsessed with blood and love. She believes cutting people and becoming them is the ultimate expression of affection. Cheerful murderer.
key_characters.backstory: Suppressed her blood cravings as a child to be 'normal' until she snapped and drank a classmate's blood. Ran away to live freely.
key_characters.power: Transform: Can shapeshift into anyone by ingesting their blood. Awakening: Can use the quirks of the people she transforms into if she loves them.

key_characters.name: Hawks (Keigo Takami)
key_characters.appearance: Average height, messy ash-blonde hair, massive red wings. Wears a visor and a fur-lined jacket.
key_characters.personality: Laid-back, cynical, and fast-talking. Acts carefree but is a ruthless, highly trained spy. He is willing to get his hands dirty for peace.
key_characters.backstory: Son of a villain. The HPSC bought him as a child and trained him to be the perfect hero soldier. He infiltrated the League of Villains as a double agent.
key_characters.power: Fierce Wings: Telekinetic control over each individual feather. Used for flight, projectiles, and sensing vibrations.

key_characters.name: Stain (Chizome Akaguro)
key_characters.appearance: No nose, messy hair, red headband/scarf. Wears tactical gear filled with knives and swords.
key_characters.personality: A fanatic ideologue. Believes modern heroes are 'fakes' seeking money and fame. Only All Might is a 'true' hero worthy of life.
key_characters.backstory: A dropout student who became a vigilante, then a serial killer. He killed or crippled 40 heroes to 'purge' society.
key_characters.power: Bloodcurdle: Paralyzes an opponent by ingesting their blood. The duration depends on the victim's blood type (Type B lasts longest).

key_characters.name: Overhaul (Kai Chisaki)
key_characters.appearance: Wears a plague doctor mask, white gloves, and a green bomber jacket with purple fur collar.
key_characters.personality: Mysophobic (germaphobe). Cold, calculating, and cruel. He views quirks as a disease that plagues humanity.
key_characters.backstory: A Yakuza leader. He tortured a child named Eri to create bullets that can permanently erase quirks, hoping to sell them to restore the Yakuza's power.
key_characters.power: Overhaul: Can disassemble and reassemble matter with a touch. He can heal wounds, kill instantly, or fuse his body with others.

key_characters.name: Mirio Togata (Lemillion)
key_characters.appearance: Muscular, blonde cowlick hair, cartoonish blue eyes. Wears a white costume with a red cape and the number 1,000,000.
key_characters.personality: Optimistic, goofy, and incredibly skilled. He embodies the ideal hero. He always smiles to reassure victims.
key_characters.backstory: Born with a difficult quirk that made him fall through floors. He trained it to perfection. Was the top candidate for One For All before Deku.
key_characters.power: Permeation: Can phase his body through any solid matter. When he releases the quirk while in a wall, he is ejected at high speed.

key_characters.name: Tsuyu Asui (Froppy)
key_characters.appearance: Large hands, wide mouth, long tongue. Posture like a frog. Wears a green and black suit.
key_characters.personality: Blunt, observant, and reliable. She is the emotional pillar of the class and rarely panics.
key_characters.backstory: Took care of her younger siblings while her parents worked, forcing her to mature quickly.
key_characters.power: Frog: Can do anything a frog can do. Wall clinging, 20-meter tongue extension, powerful jumps, camouflage, and secreting toxic mucus.

key_characters.name: Eijiro Kirishima (Red Riot)
key_characters.appearance: Spiky red hair (dyed), shark teeth, scar over right eye. Wears a costume that exposes his chest.
key_characters.personality: Manly, boisterous, and chivalrous. Values bravery above all else. Deeply loyal to his friends, especially Bakugo.
key_characters.backstory: Originally had black hair and hated his 'boring' quirk. Froze up during a villain attack in middle school and reinvented himself at U.A.
key_characters.power: Hardening: Can turn his entire body rock-hard. 'Red Riot Unbreakable' pushes his hardness to the absolute limit for 30 seconds.

key_characters.name: Momo Yaoyorozu (Creati)
key_characters.appearance: Tall, long black hair in a ponytail. Wears a revealing red outfit to allow objects to pop out of her skin.
key_characters.personality: Genius, polite, and rich. She struggles with self-confidence when comparing herself to Todoroki or Deku.
key_characters.backstory: Got into U.A. via recommendation. Comes from an incredibly wealthy family.
key_characters.power: Creation: Can create any non-living object from her exposed skin using her fat cells, as long as she understands the atomic structure.

key_characters.name: Fumikage Tokoyami (Tsukuyomi)
key_characters.appearance: Human body with a black bird head (crow). Wears a dark cloak.
key_characters.personality: Serious, chuunibyou (edgy/poetic), and disciplined. Speaks in archaic/dramatic terms.
key_characters.backstory: Interned under Hawks, who taught him how to fly.
key_characters.power: Dark Shadow: A sentient shadow monster lives inside him. It is weak and docile in light, but massive and uncontrollable in darkness.
